title: Video Editing issue in Pixel 5
content:
Hello,
There is a bug in Pixel 5 in videos. The bug arises when you do the following - 
Shoot a video in your device and edit it with photos or any other video editing app and save it.
After save open the video in photos, it will show the video with very bright colors which looks very wierd. Could someone please help me in this issue.

Regards,
Vatsal
